Texto: 
p.e. consistent with chf.
medical management
massive cardiomegaly measuring 12.2 cm a-p and 16.5 cm lat on axial ct slice. also, on ct reconstruction, the heart is shown to measure approx. 13.1 cm c-c and 16.6 cm lat. this is approx. 73% of the diameter of the chest cavity at this level (coronal view). 
consolidaiton of right lung base is noted.
cardiomegaly (chf)
chf c exacerbation
pneumonia
iatrogenic
66 y/o female with hx of chf. presents with complaints of shortness of breath. pt has an internal defibrillator placed (sternotomy/defib. wires are noted on images not included here).
